quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"tangerine"(橘子)误判为橘子类水果，或因拆分"tan"+"gelo"联想到凝胶/晒黑等无关义
quiz_item.sentence: For breakfast, she enjoyed a slice of **tangelo** with yogurt, noting its sweet-tart flavor that combined the best of oranges and grapefruits.

option.definition: 一种橘子和柚子的杂交水果（橘柚）
一种用于制作果酱的水果凝胶
一种晒干的热带水果干
